title: Accept Christ
body:
Jesus wants you. Your past doesn’t exempt you from His love. All you need to do is accept Him as your Lord and Savior and acknowledge that Jesus died for your sins on the cross and you will be saved.

How

Romans 10:9-10 says:

“9 If you declare with your mouth, “Jesus is Lord,” and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved. 10 For it is with your heart that you believe and are justified, and it is with your mouth that you profess your faith and are saved.”

Ephesians 2 10:9-10 says:

“8 For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith—and this is not from yourselves, it is the gift of God— 9 not by works, so that no one can boast.”

The Prayer

Heavenly Father, I stand here today, in your presence, I ask you to forgive me of every sin I’ve ever committed. I acknowledge and confess my sinfulness to you. I believe that Jesus died for my sins and that he rose from the grave and that He can live in my heart today. Jesus come into my life and help me to live for you in the days ahead. I confess that you are my Savior and my Lord. In Jesus name, Amen!

title: How to Pray
body:
In Matthew 6:5-15 Jesus breaks down how to pray. He notes that prayer is to be simple and humble. Below is the example that Jesus gives us.

Matthew 6:9-13 says:

“9 “This, then, is how you should pray:

“ ‘Our Father in heaven,
hallowed be your name,
10 your kingdom come,
your will be done,
on earth as it is in heaven.
11 Give us today our daily bread.
12 And forgive us our debts,
as we also have forgiven our debtors.
13 And lead us not into temptation,
but deliver us from the evil one.’

title: How to hear God’s voice
body:
1. Enter his courts with thanksgiving and praise
  2. Read the bible
  3. Listen and allow The Holy Spirit to enter your moment

Work the word

God’s word is satisfying. Meaning, you don’t always need to read many verses, but if you work the same verse or chapter over and over, He can interpret it for you. It is more important to fully understand the word God is speaking to you through His Word. Allow The Spirit to guide your understanding.
